title: Grok Image Generation
overviewMarkdown:
## Grok Image Generation Plugin

Generate images using Grok's API from x.ai directly in TypingMind chats. Perfect for visualizing network diagrams or tech ideas!

**Usage:** In a chat, describe the image (e.g., 'Generate an image of a futuristic network setup'). The AI may call this function automatically if function calling is enabled, or invoke it manually if supported.

**Settings:** Provide your x.ai API key (get it from x.ai dashboard).

Based on x.ai docs: https://docs.x.ai/docs/guides/image-generations
